name: Cable Chaos (Maroon Seal, k-a-i)
description:
CHOMP THROUGH THE CABLES!

UH OH! Your grandpa downloaded a virus! QUICK!  You have to stop it from spreading and sharing his private information! Use the golf cart to speed around the retirement resort and cut the cables  joining the computers using the roof shark. The more computers you save from being infected, the more points you get! 

This game was made for the GMTK2021 Game Jam with the theme "Joined Together" and all assets were produced during the 48Hour period (Apart from some that were reused from our previous entry Buoy Trouble). 

CONTROLS

Use either WASD or the Arrow Keys to drive the kart. 

CREDITS

Programming and Game Design - Rory Maclennan

SFX and Audio - Kai Jenkins

2D and 3D Art - Annie Walsh, George Cozens and Linus Dawson 

Voice Acting - Thomas Jenkins
